ai.summary: East Trail is a short, easy 1.2 km hike in the UK, suitable for beginners and families. It offers a gentle walk with light scenery and minimal elevation.
ai.terrain_summary: The route follows flat or gently undulating paths, mostly well-maintained gravel and compact soil. Expect some roots or small rocks near shaded sections; can be uneven in places.
ai.safety_notes: Dress for changeable UK weather, wear sturdy footwear, stay on marked paths, and keep to daylight hours. Bring water and a basic map or GPS. Be cautious on wet or muddy sections and watch for other walkers and cyclists if the trail overlaps with shared routes.
ai.best_seasons: Spring and autumn offer the most comfortable conditions; the trail is walkable year-round with appropriate gear for winter or rainy seasons.

seo.title: East Trail: 1.2 km Easy Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore East Trail, a short 1.2 km easy hike in the UK. Learn about terrain, safety tips, gear, and the best seasons for this beginner-friendly trail.
